ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 3 The Same Coin
ComicInfo.Summary: Chapter 3 The Same Coin: After being shot, Amelia and Delia use Lazarus Resin to restore Jason to life. Deadshot is less than thrilled about being restored as a zombie. Hanna helps Jason gain perspective on the team. Crispin sends Jason and the team to take out the remaining Kobra cult members, but they soon face an unexpected threat.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 20:42:38. [CVDB900199] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:49:29. [Issue ID 2292236]
